org.apache.hama.ipc

Interface BSPPeerProtocol

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Constants, HamaRPCProtocolVersion, VersionedProtocol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroomServer, LocalBSPRunner.LocalUmbilical

    public interface BSPPeerProtocol
extends HamaRPCProtocolVersion, Closeable, Constants
    Protocol that task child process uses to contact its parent process.

    • Field Summary
